sense.gloss: to hear
to listen (e.g. to music)
to ask, to enquire, to query
to hear about, to hear of, to learn of
to follow (advice, order, etc.), to obey, to listen to, to comply with
to hear (e.g. a plea), to grant (a request), to accept (e.g. an argument), to give consideration to
to smell (esp. incense), to sample (a fragrance)
to taste (alcohol), to try
looking and listening, (television) viewing, watching
(public) attention, interest
to be heard, to be audible, to reach one's ears
to sound (like), to come across (as)
to be well known, to be famous
to accept (someone's words), to agree, to understand
to permit, to allow, to approve, to consent to
to forgive, to pardon, to excuse, to tolerate
to exempt (someone) from, to remit, to release, to let off
to acknowledge, to admit
to trust, to confide in, to let one's guard down
to give up (points in a game, distance in a race, etc.), to yield
hearing (of a statement, opinion, explanation, etc.), asking, questioning (e.g. a suspect), enquiry
listening (e.g. to the radio)
listening (to a lecture, hearing, parliament session, etc.), attending (without participating), sitting in (e.g. on a meeting), observing
audience, attendance, hearers
hearing, audible sound
rumour, rumor, hearsay, reputation
tasting (alcohol, tea, etc.)
listening comprehension, aural comprehension
hearing what others say, gathering information, opinions, etc., public hearing
interception (email), wiretap, bug

sdata.j: ↑賢明↑↓けんめい↓さを↑理解↑↓りかい↓するには↑賢明↑↓けんめい↓でなければならない。↑音楽↑↓おんがく↓は↑聴衆↑↓ちょうしゅう↓がろう↑者↑↓しゃ↓では↑意味↑↓いみ↓がないのと↑同様↑↓どうよう↓に。
sdata.e: It requires wisdom to understand wisdom: the music is nothing if the audience is deaf.

sdata.j: ↑会場↑↓かいじょう↓は↑立↑↓たた↓すいの↑余地↑↓よち↓もないほどに↑聴衆↑↓ちょうしゅう↓で↑埋↑↓う↓まっていた。
sdata.e: The hall was filled with such a large audience that there wasn't even standing room.

sdata.j: ↑会場↑↓かいじょう↓は↑聴衆↑↓ちょうしゅう↓でいっぱいだった。
sdata.e: This hall was full of people.

sdata.j: ↑会館↑↓かいかん↓は↑聴衆↑↓ちょうしゅう↓でいっぱいになった。
↑音楽↑↓おんがく↓を↑聴↑↓き↓くのはとても↑楽↑↓たの↓しい。
sdata.e: It is a lot of fun to listen to music.

sdata.j: ↑音楽↑↓おんがく↓を↑聴↑↓き↓くのが↑好↑↓す↓きですか、それとも、↑歌↑↓うた↓うのが↑好↑↓す↓きですか。
sdata.e: Do you like listening to music or singing songs?

sdata.j: ↑音楽↑↓おんがく↓を↑聴↑↓き↓きます。
↑音楽↑↓おんがく↓を↑聴↑↓き↓いて↑彼女↑↓かのじょ↓の↑神経↑↓しんけい↓が↑静↑↓しず↓まった。
↑演奏↑↓えんそう↓↑会↑↓かい↓には↑沢山↑↓たくさん↓の↑聴衆↑↓ちょうしゅう↓がいた。
sdata.e: There was a large audience at the concert.

sdata.j: コンサートの↑聴衆↑↓ちょうしゅう↓は↑多↑↓おお↓かった。
sdata.e: There was a large audience at the concert.

words.gloss: to be heard, to be audible, to reach one's ears
